title: MOOC-Integrated Instructional Design for [Self-Directed] Corporate Practitioners: Simulation/VR-Based Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Integrating MOOCs into campus education to enhance workplace relevance for current practitioners. Requires personalized learning designs considering motivational profiles and psychological needs.

learning_goals: Learners can self-direct learning activities at least three times weekly in an integrated learning environment combining MOOCs with simulation/VR.
Learners can design VR simulations to solve social problems with over 80% accuracy by connecting MOOC content with corporate case studies.
Learners can develop personalized learning strategies based on motivational profiles (self-determination, assessment-driven, trust-driven) and submit reflective reports on implementation outcomes.

resources: Social Issue Resolution Simulation Scenario Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
